mapper.select: SELECT BREED, COUNT(*) AS breed_count, ROUND((COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PET) * 100), 1) AS breed_percentage FROM PET GROUP BY BREED
SELECT AGE, COUNT(*) AS age_count, ROUND((COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PET) * 100), 1) AS age_percentage FROM PET GROUP BY AGE ORDER BY AGE
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) AS gender_count, ROUND((COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PET) * 100), 1) AS gender_percentage FROM PET GROUP BY gender ORDER BY gender_count
SELECT TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, COUNT(*) AS monthly_guest_count FROM GUEST GROUP BY TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month

WITH TotalSavings AS (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ACCOUNT_NUMBER) AS total_accounts, COUNT(DISTINCT GUEST_ID) AS total_guests FROM JOIN_SAVING)
SELECT SA.CATEGORY, COUNT(DISTINCT JS.ACCOUNT_NUMBER) AS category_accounts, ROUND((COUNT(DISTINCT JS.ACCOUNT_NUMBER) * 100.0 / (SELECT total_accounts FROM TotalSavings)), 1) AS account_percentage, COUNT(DISTINCT JS.GUEST_ID) AS category_guests FROM SAVING_ACCOUNT SA JOIN JOIN_SAVING JS ON SA.ACCOUNT_NUMBER = JS.ACCOUNT_NUMBER GROUP BY SA.CATEGORY ORDER BY account_percentage DESC, category_guests desc

WITH TotalInsurance AS (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT GUEST_ID) AS total_guests FROM JOIN_INSURANCE)
SELECT INSURANCE_NAME, COUNT(DISTINCT GUEST_ID) AS insurance_guests, ROUND((COUNT(DISTINCT GUEST_ID) * 100.0 / (SELECT total_guests FROM TotalInsurance)), 1) AS percentage FROM JOIN_INSURANCE GROUP BY INSURANCE_NAME ORDER BY INSURANCE_NAME
